resources.string: In order to add a new match you need to have at least 4 players defined. Select \'List of players\' from options menu and add more players.

Add a new match by pressing 'New match' button on top of the screen or by selecting 'New match' from options menu. Latest match will be shown at the top of the list.

Press match in a list in order to get match details.

Delete single match by long pressing it or delete all matches by selecting 'Delete all' from options menu.

To manage players select 'List of players' from the options menu.

Add a new player by pressing 'New player' button on top of the screen or by selecting 'New player' from the options menu. Player name must be unique. Players are sorted alphabetically. There is a statistical data for each player in the list which shows how many he has played and how many has he won.

Delete single player by long pressing it or delete all players by selecting 'Delete all' from options menu.

WARNING
You should only delete players that aren't connected to any match otherwise match will not be able to retrieve connection to that player.

Top of the screen shows sides and current sets result.

Add a new game by pressing 'New game' button on top of the screen or by selecting 'New game' from the options menu. The latest game will be shown at the bottom of the list.

At the bottom of the screen there's a number of total game points in current set along with the difference between sides.

Delete game by long pressing it.

To see list of sets in current match select 'List of sets' from the options menu.

To see match statistics select 'Match statistics' from the options menu.
Displays list of games chronologically. It\'s possible to delete game by long pressing it but only if this is the last set in a match.
Displays list of sets chronologically in a current match. Press desired set to see a list of games in that particular set.
Select Team 1 and Team 2 players. Players must vary in order to create a match.\n\nTo change set limit for current match edit \'Set limit\' value.

In a game where game points vary from default value, there were either declarations or all tricks.

To set declarations select side by pressing declaration team radio button. With +20 and +50 buttons enter declarations value. If opposite team declared Bela, press 'Bela' check box. Switching between declaration teams will reset game points to default.

If game ended with all tricks owned by one team, press 'All tricks' check box.

Enter team points only for one side, other will be calculated automatically based on game points. Take into account that declarations are not added to team points automatically.

Chosen trump
It's a rate between total number of games and number of games in which certain side chose trump.

Passed games
